## `memer`

A `tidyverse`-compatible `R` package for creating memes. Mostly wrappers around `magick` functions. 

```{r cdistbf, fig.align='center'}
library(memer)
meme_get("DistractedBf") %>% 
  meme_text_distbf("tidyverse", "new R users", "base R")
```
